body: @KarlJeanJeune shares some distressing news on Twitter: "5 Armed men in a white Toyota Landcruiser opened fire in the Petionville Area in Rue Faubert. No known victims. #Haiti"
original_body: @KarlJeanJeune shares some distressing news on Twitter: "5 Armed men in a white Toyota Landcruiser opened fire in the Petionville Area in Rue Faubert. No known victims. #Haiti"
title: Haiti: Drive-By Shooting Reported
